repositories.description: Map of maven repositories to access for fetching maven artifacts. If not defined and no settings.xml provided with remote repositories, then the mule runtime will work in offline mode

url.description: URL to access the maven repository

globalSettingsLocation.description: Location of the maven global settings.xml file. It can be a classpath reference in which case the file can be placed in the MULE_HOME/conf folder or an absolute path to the file. If defined, the repositories and proxies configured on it will be used by the runtime

userSettingsLocation.description: Location of the maven user settings.xml file. It can be a classpath reference in which case the file can be placed in the MULE_HOME/conf folder or an absolute path to the file. If defined, the repositories and proxies configured on it will be used by the runtime. If a global settings is configured, it will be merged with the user settings

settingsSecurityLocation.description: Location of the maven settings-security.xml file. It can be a classpath reference in which case the file can be placed in the MULE_HOME/conf folder or an absolute path to the file. If defined, the encrypted passwords for servers on user and global settings will be decrypted using the master password defined on this file

repositoryLocation.description: Repository location for the mule runtime to use. If not provided it will be the MULE_HOME/repository folder

ignoreArtifactDescriptorRepositories.description: Flag to ignore additional repositories from artifact descriptors, false to merge those with the originally specified remote repositories. Default value is true

offLineMode.description: Flag to control whether the repository system operates in offline mode and avoids/refuses any access to remote repositories

forcePolicyUpdateNever.description: Flag to control whether the repository system operates with an UPDATE_POLICY_NEVER for SNAPSHOTS. By default it is set to false. This is the equivalent to {@code -nsu} option for Maven CLI

forcePolicyUpdateAlways.description: Flag to control whether the repository system operates with an UPDATE_POLICY_ALWAYS for SNAPSHOTS. By default it is set to false. This is the equivalent to {@code -U} option for Maven CLI. This value is ignored if {@code forcePolicyUpdateNever} is set to {@code true}

objectStore.description: Configuration for Object Stores implementation for clustering

enabled.description: If true and if cluster is configured then the object store (org.mule.runtime.api.store.ObjectStore) implementation of the runtime will be overwritten with the Mule EE cluster implementation

lockFactory.description: Configuration for Lock Factory implementation for clustering

enabled.description: If true and if cluster is configured then the lock factory (org.mule.runtime.api.lock.LockFactory) implementation of the runtime will be overwritten with the Mule EE cluster implementation

timeSupplier.description: Configuration for Time Supplier implementation for clustering

enabled.description: If true and if cluster is configured then the time supplier (org.mule.runtime.api.time.TimeSupplier) implementation of the runtime will be overwritten with the Mule EE cluster implementation

queueManager.description: Configuration for Queue Manager implementation for clustering

enabled.description: If true and if cluster is configured then the queue manager (org.mule.runtime.core.api.util.queue.QueueManager) implementation of the runtime will be overwritten with the Mule EE cluster implementation

clusterService.description: Configuration for Cluster Service implementation for clustering

enabled.description: If true and if cluster is configured then the cluster service (org.mule.runtime.api.cluster.ClusterService) implementation of the runtime will be overwritten with the Mule EE cluster implementation
